item.title: 0747 Windows Firefox Current Tabs
item.description: Record what was going on, and a chance to organise and review Note that pinned tabs have been removed. When the markdown is pasted in, there are no line breaks so all the links run together. At the moment, the simple solution is to add an asterisk space at the fron of each line. The best way to do this with Visual Studio Code is to: select the lines to be updated Press SHIFT + ALT + I to insert multiple cursors at the end of each line.

item.title: 0719 netlify
item.description: Watch the video Watched Brad Traversy’s Youtube video. Build a Responsive Website | HTML, CSS Grid, Flexbox & More A CSS framework like Bootstrap is not used. Instead, CSS is used in two ways. As utility classes, used as part of HTML, as per CSS frameworks, and in the usual way to target specific HTML. The CSS resulting is quite long though. Netlify is used to deploy to a live website, and as well as github (used previously but not this time) a project folder can be dragged in to netlify.
